metadata.title: CVE-2024-35830 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: media:tc358743: register v4l2 async device only after successful setup Ensure thedevice has been setup correctly before registering the v4l2 async device,thus allowing userspace to access.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
